title: LOL LAUNCHER WONT OPEN
body: my lol client wont open even if i click it a few times.When i click the lol launcher the icon pops out and it disappears.I even got a leaver buster because of this

replies.body: Something may be blocking the patcher access from loading.  I suggest a restart as a first step in case anything with your OS is causing a hiccup.  If the issue persists then go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your settings to allow access.  Let me know if you have questions.
